headline: Change Foods Secures Funding for Animal-Free Dairy
summary: Change Foods gains investment to scale up their precision-fermentation based vegan dairy production platform.

headline: Modern Synthesis Raises Funds to Scale Microbial Textile
summary: Modern Synthesis secures funding to expand production of their bio-fabricated textile using microbial weaving.

headline: Solar Foods Factory Expansion Doubles Solein Production
summary: Solar Foods expands its factory, doubling the production capacity of Solein, their air-based protein.

headline: Bolt Threads Partners with Luxury Brand for Mylo Leather Alternative
summary: Bolt Threads announces a partnership with a luxury brand to incorporate Mylo, a mushroom-based leather alternative.

headline: Formo Launches First Precision-Fermented Cheese in Europe
summary: Formo releases its first precision-fermented cheese product to consumers in select European markets.

headline: Algiknit Secures Series A Funding for Seaweed-Based Yarn
summary: Algiknit raises Series A funding to scale up production of their yarn made from seaweed.

headline: Perfect Day Announces New Ice Cream Flavors Using Animal-Free Whey
summary: Perfect Day introduces new ice cream flavors, showcasing the versatility of their animal-free whey protein.

headline: BioMason Announces New Line of Carbon-Sequestering Cement
summary: BioMason launches a new line of cement made with bacterial biomineralization that sequesters carbon dioxide.

headline: Air Protein Partners With Food Manufacturer for Novel Products
summary: Air Protein partners with a major food manufacturer to develop new products using their air-based protein.

headline: Desserto Cactus Leather Used in New Automotive Interiors
summary: Desserto cactus leather is featured in the interior design of a new line of electric vehicles.
